data.fullContent: RAM is an acronym that stands for Random Access Memory. `` Random access '' means that the contents of the memory can be accessed in any random order. The term was originally coined to differentiate it from serial memory ( such as data stored on a magnetic tape ). The contents of a serial memory could only be accessed sequentially. RAM is a volatile memory, which means that when the power is turned off, the information stored there is lost.
data.answer: RAM是随机存取存储器的首字母缩写。“随机访问”是指可以以任意随机的顺序访问内存的内容。最初创造这个术语是为了将其与串行存储器(如存储在磁带上的数据)区分开来。串行存储器的内容只能按顺序访问。RAM是一种易失性存储器，这意味着当电源关闭时，存储在那里的信息就会丢失。
